title: Bootstrap Laravel + Filament and ship a Gumroad-style landing page
why_now: We need the web-first foundation and a clean landing page to capture interest while core features are being built.
definition_of_done: New Laravel 11 project initialized, repo connected
Filament v3 installed; /admin reachable with working login (no Breeze)
Tailwind configured; clean Gumroad-like theme (simple typography, wide cards, muted palette)
Public landing at / with hero, value prop, categories, CTA (Join Waitlist) storing to DB
.env.example updated; README updated with setup steps
Evidence screenshots saved under /evidence/2025-08/landing-*.png; decision logged
